name: project.pixelships
description:
A RPG Shoot-em-up in the spirit of classic DOS Shmups like "Tyrian 2000" and "Raptor: Call of the Shadows".

Shoot your way trough multiple planets & asteroid belts while you buy and upgrade new ships, weapons, reactors, and armor along the way.

This is an early alpha "proof of concept" demo, and is - as such - missing key features and functionality. Not representative of final product.

Demo Features:

  • 1 level
  • 1 pilotable ship
  • 6 types of enemies
  • 1 miniboss
  • 6 weapons to buy & equip
